ygData.subject: RE: RE: Anybody alive
ygData.msgSnippet: Hail All, I too have been around, just not as much. Summer is just the busy season for RL. I m on a new job and house hunting so play time is down to one or 2
ygData.messageBody:
Hail All,

I too have been around, just not as much. Summer is just the busy season
for RL. I'm on a new job and house hunting so play time is down to one or 2
times a week. I've gotten one bubble or so on 52 so far. I did finally get a
sharkskin drum a month ago, one of those 'I can't believe it spawned!' days.
Several of my normal higher level group mates have been off alot as well, so
my wiz is finally gaining ground, up to 27 as of last night.
I'm currently looking at upgrade paths for my PC. I figure the new
expansion will kill my current machine since Kunark trees bog it down now.

Now a question: Was Selo's Song of Travel intended for a high mortality rate
among group members or is that just a bonus? I think I have killed everyone
I know running across Dreadlands at least once.

Brilinnia Ban'Sidhe, 52 and Holding
Excalibur, on Xegony
